apiURL.desc: URL to call for the Riot Games API.

apiRegionAsSubdomain.desc: Whether to use the region as a subdomain in the API URL. If false, the region will be a query parameter.

maxConcurrentRequests.desc: Maximum number of concurrent requests allowed.

concurrentInstanceFactor.desc: Multiplier for using concurrent instances. For example, use 0.25 for 4 concurrent instances equally spread.

overheadFactor.desc: Overhead factor to reduce the chance 429s due to network noise.

retries.desc: Number of times to retry a failed request (zero for no retries).

tokenBucketFactory.val: (timespan, totalLimit, concurrentInstanceFactor, overheadFactor) => new MingweiSamuel.TokenBucket.CircularTokenBucket(timespan, totalLimit, 20, 0.5f, concurrentInstanceFactor * overheadFactor)

backoffStrategy.desc: A backoff strategy for 429s with missing Retry-After headers. Returns seconds.
